todos.content: Read and understand current README content
Initialize git repo and push to GitHub
todos.activeForm: Initializing git and pushing to GitHub

tool_input.command:
git init && git add . && git commit -m "Initial commit: Next.js TUI templater with Bubble Tea

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>" && gh repo create WillyV3/nextjs-templater --public --description "A beautiful TUI to scaffold Next.js projects with shadcn/ui components and authentication" --source=. --push
tool_input.description: Initialize git, commit, create GitHub repo and push
